prompt: Create a bold, print-ready vector artwork (isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows) on a vibrant hot pink solid background. MUST include a thick black vector-style outline around the isolated elements (text and graphics) ONLY; do NOT add a square frame or border around the entire image. ASPECT RATIO: 4:5 portrait. Fill the ENTIRE canvas — the graphic elements, text, and composition MUST extend to the edges so the design feels full, bold and immersive. Centered, stacked composition with large chunky display typography and playful illustrative elements integrated into the type. Typography: heavy, rounded comic-style display letters, bright yellow fill with subtle flat highlight accents (no photorealistic shading), slight inner radius on letterforms for a friendly look, tightly kerned and slightly condensed so lines interlock; all type outlined with the same thick black vector stroke; small white cloud puffs used as separators and accents between lines, also outlined in the same thick black stroke. Graphic elements: a simple cartoon smiling sun character (bright yellow with orange cheeks and black vector outline) peeking from the right-middle area, small white rounded clouds scattered around and overlapping type to create a compact, full-bleed composition. Layout: stack the headline and body copy so the top phrase anchors the composition and the longer phrase fills the lower area, elements intentionally extend to the canvas edges (letters or clouds may cut off at the edges) to avoid empty margins. Flat vector look, high-contrast, print-ready. TEXT Hungarian: "ÉLJ A MÁNAK!" (above) "MERT A HOLNAP VALÓSZÍNŰLEG MÉG SZARABB LESZ!" isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows. --ar 4:5
negative_prompt: mockup, garment, t-shirt, hoodie, photo, fabric texture, realistic shadows, person, frame, border, background gradients, t-shirt mockup, hoodie mockup, garment, fabric texture, wrinkles, folds, shadows, photo, model, background scene, studio lighting

debug.notes: Main headline and body copy are clear and legible in the image. There is a small illegible line of tiny text at the very bottom (likely a website) which is omitted from the prompt.
